dict.string: With full permission, your data will be uploaded to our server and the user (group manager) sends its contacts to the control panel administrator. 1. In the control panel, the process of comparing contacts and voters who meet the terms of the election is carried out. 2. The app then returns a contact list of eligible voters to the user. 3. That determines each district user (groups admin) and voters to mobilize during the pre-election period 4. Every process in the application is stored in the control panel for review by the campaign supervisors. 5. The users (group managers) select several contacts as assistants or "followers" who help users mobilize voters during the electoral campaign and are marked in the app as followers. The followers do not have accounts on the app, and it is the user's responsibility (group admin) to communicate with them personally and not through the application.
